question_content: Video Welcome: Amanda Roy introduction (45-60 seconds)
options_details: Hi! I'm Amanda Roy, CEO of the Greater Hartford Arts Council...

question_content: Amanda: Thanks for watching! As I mentioned, this conversation is all about understanding what matters to you when it comes to the arts in Greater Hartford...
options_details:
• 🎨 Let's start
• 🤔 Tell me more first
logic_branching: If "Tell me more first" → Extended info → Let's go button

question_content: Amanda: Before we begin, I'd love to know your first name so we can make this conversation more personal. What should I call you?
options_details: First Name (Optional)
logic_branching: If no name provided → "No problem! Let's get started."

question_content: Amanda: {Name}, I'd love to know—what's your connection to Greater Hartford Arts Council?
options_details:
• I currently support GHAC
• I've supported GHAC in the past
• I participated through a workplace giving campaign
• I'm connected through an artist or arts organization
• This is my first time learning about GHAC
• Other connection
logic_branching: Branch responses based on selection (see below)

question_content: Dynamic response based on connection type
options_details:
Currently support: "That's wonderful, {Name}! Thank you..."
Past support: "It's great to reconnect..."
Workplace: "Ah yes, the workplace giving programs!..."
First time: "Welcome, {Name}!..."
Other: "That's interesting! I'd love to hear more..." [Text Input]

question_content: Amanda: The arts ecosystem includes many different touchpoints. How do you currently connect with the arts in our region?
options_details:
• I attend performances, exhibitions, or events
• I visit museums, galleries, or cultural sites
• I have friends or family who are artists
• I see arts as vital to community wellbeing
• I donate to arts organizations
• I believe arts education is essential
• My work involves creative thinking
• Other connection
logic_branching: Dynamic response based on number selected

question_content: Amanda: When you think about the role of arts in Greater Hartford, how essential do you believe they are?
options_details:
1️⃣ Nice to have, but not essential
2️⃣ Somewhat important
3️⃣ Important for quality of life
4️⃣ Very important to our community
5️⃣ Absolutely essential—like schools or healthcare

question_content: Amanda: You are doing amazing, {name}! Half way done already. Now, here's something I'm genuinely curious about—what's one way the arts have touched your life personally?
options_details:
• 🎥 Record a video (2 min max)
• 🎤 Record audio (2 min max)
• ⌨️ Type my response
• 🤐 I'd prefer to skip this

question_content:
Amanda: [Conditional text based on supporter status]
Current/Past: "Thinking about why you've chosen to support GHAC or other arts organizations, what drives your giving decisions most?"
Non-supporter: "If you were to support an arts organization, what would be most important to you?"
options_details:
• Knowing my support directly helps individual artists
• Seeing measurable community impact
• Ensuring arts access for underserved communities
• Preserving our cultural heritage
• Strengthening our creative economy
• Investing in youth arts programs
• Something else drives my decisions

question_content: Amanda: Based on what you know about GHAC—even if it's limited—I'm curious where you'd place us on these spectrums. Be honest!
options_details:
Traditional ○○○○○ Innovative
Corporate ○○○○○ Community-focused
Transactional ○○○○○ Relationship-based
Behind the scenes ○○○○○ Visible catalyst
Exclusive ○○○○○ Inclusive

question_content: Amanda: Organizations can connect with supporters in many ways. What type of relationship would feel most meaningful to you?
options_details:
• Keep me informed and inspired
• Invite me to special experiences
• Include me in important decisions
• Connect me with like-minded people
• Let me support from a distance
• Engage my professional skills
• I'm still figuring that out

question_content: Amanda: What, if anything, makes it challenging to engage with arts organizations?
options_details:
• Unclear how my support creates change
• Don't feel personally welcomed
• Financial constraints
• Time constraints
• Lack of information about opportunities
• Past experiences felt impersonal
• Life feels overwhelming right now
• Other causes take priority
• Nothing—I'm satisfied with my current level
logic_branching:
CONDITIONAL: Show only if not current supporter OR past supporter
Special response if "Nothing" selected

question_content: Amanda: Here's a thought experiment—if you could transform one thing about how arts organizations in Greater Hartford operate or engage with the community, what would it be?
options_details:
• 🎥 Record a video (2 min max)
• 🎤 Record audio (2 min max)
• ⌨️ Type my response

question_content: Amanda: Creativity shows up in many ways. Which of these resonate with your personal relationship to creativity?
options_details:
• I pursue creative hobbies in my free time
• I wish I had more creative outlets
• Creative problem-solving is part of my work
• I'm passionate about specific art forms
• I see supporting artists as civic responsibility
• Innovation and experimentation excite me
• I believe traditional arts deserve preservation

question_content: Amanda: Looking ahead, what would you most like to see strengthen in Greater Hartford's arts ecosystem?
options_details:
• More opportunities for emerging artists
• Arts education for young people
• Public art that reflects our diversity
• Sustainable funding for arts organizations
• Creative spaces for artists to work and gather
• Arts as economic development driver
• Connections between arts and wellness/healing

question_content: Amanda: Everyone contributes differently to our creative community. What specific opportunities might interest you in the next year?
options_details:
• Learning about artists and their stories
• Behind-the-scenes studio visits
• Donor gatherings and salons
• Sharing my professional expertise
• Advisory committee participation
• Monthly or quarterly giving
• Hosting a friend-raising event
• I need to learn more first

question_content: Amanda: If we were to share updates about our impact and opportunities, how would you prefer to hear from us?
options_details:
• Email updates with stories and impact
• Text messages about events and opportunities
• Future conversations like this one
• Printed newsletter (quarterly)
• Social media updates
• I'd prefer not to receive updates
• A mix of these
logic_branching: Branch to appropriate contact form based on selection

question_content: Contact information collection based on communication preference
options_details:
Email: First Name*, Last Name*, Email*, Mobile (optional)
Text: First Name*, Last Name*, Mobile*, Email*
Newsletter: First Name*, Last Name*, Email*, Full Address*
Mix: First Name*, Last Name*, Email*, Mobile (optional)

question_content: Amanda: One last question—how valuable was this conversation for you?
options_details:
1️⃣ Not valuable
2️⃣ Somewhat valuable
3️⃣ Valuable
4️⃣ Very valuable
5️⃣ Extremely valuable—I'm glad we connected

question_content: Amanda: {Name}, thank you so much for sharing your thoughts! Would you be willing to share a bit more about yourself?
options_details:
• Yes, I'll share
• I'd prefer not to
logic_branching:
If "Yes" → Continue to demographics
If "No" → Skip to thank you

question_content: Demographics questions (OPTIONAL - only if consent given)
options_details:
ZIP code (Text)
Age range (Multiple choice)
Giving level (Multiple choice - conditional)
Race/ethnicity (Multi-select)
Gender identity (Multiple choice)
logic_branching: Giving level only shows if current/past supporter

question_content: One last thing—based on the interests you've shared today, may we reach out about relevant opportunities?
options_details:
• Yes, please keep me in the loop
• Not right now, but maybe later
• No thank you

question_content: Amanda: {Name}, thank you so much for this conversation! Your insights help us reimagine what it means to be a catalyst for the arts in Greater Hartford...
options_details:
• Explore GHAC's current programs
• Close for now
